etymology.description: Phonetic transliteration: Wū + lǔ + mù + qí ≈ Ürümchi (Urumqi).
etymology.interpretation: Chinese transcription of the Uyghur name Ürümchi, used for the capital of Xinjiang. Characters were chosen for sound rather than literal meaning.
etymology.simplification: General character simplification applied: 烏→乌, 魯→鲁, 齊→齐 (木 unchanged); standardized in PRC with no change to pronunciation or meaning.

parts.english: Urumqi; Ürümchi; transliteration of Uyghur place name

examples.chinese: 乌鲁木齐是新疆的首府(烏魯木齊是新疆的首府)。
examples.english: Urumqi is the capital of Xinjiang.

examples.chinese: 我想去乌鲁木齐旅行(我想去烏魯木齊旅行)。
examples.english: I want to travel to Urumqi.

examples.chinese: 从北京到乌鲁木齐有直飞航班(從北京到烏魯木齊有直飛航班)。
examples.pinyin: Cóng Běijīng dào Wūlǔmùqí yǒu zhífēi hángbān.
examples.english: There are nonstop flights from Beijing to Urumqi.
